title: RESEARCH and DESTROY
description: RESEARCH and DESTROY is a TURN-BASED ACTION GAME with local and online co-op. Take control of three brilliant scientists as you RESEARCH and develop strange new weapons and gadgets to DESTROY the Supernatural hordes that have all but crushed humanity Gain fresh insight into the Supernatural threat via battlefield vivisections, then develop radical upgrades for each weird weapon and fascinating gadget Plan ahead, then run-and-gun in a combination of turn-based strategy and real-time shooting every second counts Adapt your guerrilla science tactics to manage the campaign map and seek the Supernatural source no two playthroughs are the same HunterX
